characterDescriptions.Pilot: experienced pilot figure wearing navy uniform with gold wings pin, captain's hat, '10,000 HOURS' badge

scenes.text: Pilots with 10,000 hours of flying still read the same checklist every single flight.
scenes.prompt: An experienced pilot figure with '10,000 HOURS' badge reading from a checklist in a cockpit. Despite expertise, the checklist is used every time. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Not because they forgot how to fly.
scenes.prompt: The experienced pilot figure with flight knowledge clearly shown in a thought bubble. Memory is intact. The word 'FORGOT' is crossed out. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Because they don't trust their memory under pressure.
scenes.prompt: The experienced pilot figure with a thought bubble showing memory becoming fuzzy under stress and alarm indicators. Pressure affects recall. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
A checkmark beside the pilot's decision to use checklists. The caution is validated. Correct choice. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Standing cartoon person receiving a checklist document from the pilot figure. The tool is transferable. Anyone can use it. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
